languages.text: "Верно. Век мон-кай слишком короток, чтобы помнить. Пламя ваших душ угасает еще до того, как мои братья и сестры успевают насладиться юностью своего разума".

traits.locale_text: "Верно. Век мон-кай слишком короток, чтобы помнить. Плямя ваших душ угасает еще до того, как мои братья и сестры успевают насладиться юностью своего разума".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Indeed. A mon-keigh's years are too few for memories. The flame of your souls is extinguished by the time a brother or sister of mine has not yet fully savoured their reason's youth."
languages.original_text: "Верно. Век мон-кай слишком короток, чтобы помнить. Пламя ваших душ угасает еще до того, как мои братья и сестры успевают насладиться юностью своего разума".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. A mon-keigh's years are too few for memories. The flame of your souls is extinguished by the time a brother or sister of mine has not yet fully savoured their reason's youth."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. A mon-keigh's years are too few for memories. The flame of your souls is extinguished by the time a brother or sister of mine has not yet fully savoured their reason's youth."

languages.text: «Lógico. Las vidas de los mon-keigh duran muy pocos años para engendrar recuerdos. La llama de vuestras almas se extingue cuando uno de los míos aún sigue disfrutando de la juventud de su mente».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. A mon-keigh's years are too few for memories. The flame of your souls is extinguished by the time a brother or sister of mine has not yet fully savoured their reason's youth."

traits.locale_text: «Lógico. Las vidas de los mon-keigh duran muy pocos años para engendrar recuerdos. La llama de vuestras almas se extingue cuando uno de los míos aún sigue disfrutando de la juventud de su mente».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「いかにも。モン＝ケイの一生は、思い出となるには短すぎる。私の兄弟や姉妹の誰かが、その理性の青春をまだ十分に味わぬうちに、お前たちの魂の炎は消えてしまうのだ」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. A mon-keigh's years are too few for memories. The flame of your souls is extinguished by the time a brother or sister of mine has not yet fully savoured their reason's youth."

traits.locale_text: 「いかにも。モン＝ケイの一生は、思い出となるには短すぎる。私の兄弟や姉妹の誰かが、その理性の青春をまだ十分に味わぬうちに、お前たちの魂の炎は消えてしまうのだ」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “确实如此。猴子的寿命过于短暂，无法记得太多事情。当我的兄弟姐妹们还没有享受青春的理性时，你们灵魂的火焰就已经熄灭了。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. A mon-keigh's years are too few for memories. The flame of your souls is extinguished by the time a brother or sister of mine has not yet fully savoured their reason's youth."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。猴子的寿命过于短暂，无法记得太多事情。当我的兄弟姐妹们还没有享受青春的理性时，你们灵魂的火焰就已经熄灭了。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « En effet. Les mon-keigh ne vivent pas assez longtemps pour s'embarrasser de souvenirs. La flamme de vos âmes est éteinte alors même que mes frères et mes sœurs commencent à peine à savourer leur jeunesse. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. A mon-keigh's years are too few for memories. The flame of your souls is extinguished by the time a brother or sister of mine has not yet fully savoured their reason's youth."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Les mon-keigh ne vivent pas assez longtemps pour s'embarrasser de souvenirs. La flamme de vos âmes est éteinte alors même que mes frères et mes sœurs commencent à peine à savourer leur jeunesse. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Wie erwartet. Die Lebenszeit von Chem-Pan-Sey ist einfach zu kurz für Erinnerungen. Die Flammen Eurer Seelen erlöschen bereits, wenn einer meiner Brüder oder Schwestern gerade mal in die Jugend ihrer Vernunft eintreten."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. A mon-keigh's years are too few for memories. The flame of your souls is extinguished by the time a brother or sister of mine has not yet fully savoured their reason's youth."

traits.locale_text: "Wie erwartet. Die Lebenszeit von Chem-Pan-Sey ist einfach zu kurz für Erinnerungen. Die Flammen Eurer Seelen erlöschen bereits, wenn einer meiner Brüder oder Schwestern gerade mal in die Jugend ihrer Vernunft eintreten."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Doğrudur. Bir mon-keigh'in ömrü, birkaç hatırayı zihninde tutamayacak kadar kısa. Ruhlarınızın alevleri, kardeşlerimden biri gencecik aklından geçenlerin daha tam olarak tadına bile varamadan evvel sönüp gidiyor."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. A mon-keigh's years are too few for memories. The flame of your souls is extinguished by the time a brother or sister of mine has not yet fully savoured their reason's youth."

traits.locale_text: "Hakikaten de öyle. Bir mon-keigh'in ömrü, birkaç hatırayı zihninde tutamayacak kadar kısa. Ruhlarınızın alevleri, kardeşlerimden biri gencecik aklından geçenlerin daha tam olarak tadına bile varamadan evvel sönüp gidiyor."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
